description:
Nirvana is an ultra inversion magic that switched light and darkness! And for some reason Brain from Oracion Seis is heading toward Wendy`s guild, Caitshelter, trying to destroy it! But standing against the evil Brain is Jura of Lamia Scale, and he`s seriously angry! Can the power of someone bestowed with the title of Wizard Saint defeat Brain and stop Nirvana?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 聖十[せいてん]のジュラ
